Q1: Who is the director of the film "Coney Island Baby"?
A1: Amy Hobby

Q2: Who wrote the screenplay for the film "Coney Island Baby"?
A2: Karl Geary

Q3: Where was the film "Coney Island Baby" shot?
A3: Sligo, Ireland (also known as "Coney Island")

Q4: What is the name of the music composer for the film "Coney Island Baby"?
A4: Ryan Shore

Q5: Who won the Jury Award for "Best First Time Director" at the Newport International Film Festival for the film "Coney Island Baby"?
A5: Amy Hobby

Q6: When did the film "Coney Island Baby" premiere on television?
A6: It made its premiere television broadcast on the Sundance Channel.

Simple questions:

Q7: What is the name of the main character in the film "Coney Island Baby"?
A7: Billy Hayes

Q8: Why does Billy Hayes want to get back together with his ex-girlfriend?
A8: He wants to take her back to America and open a gas station.

Q9: What is the problem that Billy faces in trying to win back his ex-girlfriend?
A9: She is engaged and pregnant.

A10: Amy Hobby directed the movie.

Q11: What was written for the film "Coney Island Baby"?
A11: Karl Geary wrote the screenplay for the movie.

Q12: Where did the filming of "Coney Island Baby" take place?
A12: The film was shot in Sligo, Ireland.
